title.text: Visual Studio 2005 Express Editions Service Pack 1

description.text: Visual Studio 2005 Express Editions Service Pack 1 updates Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 Express Edition systems with the latest security and stability enhancements to help keep those systems up-to-date, reliable, and secure.  The goal of all of our service packs is to increase the overall quality of the existing product features while maintaining a high level of compatibility. The installation of this service pack might take up to several hours. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
